titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to issue a nationwide marketing order applicable to milk and milk products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) issue a proposed nationwide milk marketing order; and (2) conduct a producer referendum to determine whether such order is approved or disapproved.
